    • createSchedule

      @RequestMapping(value="/api/schedule", method=POST) @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<Schedule> createSchedule(@CookieValue(name="access-token") AccessToken accessToken, @RequestParam String name)
      Creates a schedule for the given user
      Parameters:
      accessToken - used to authenticate the user
      name - the for the schedule to be created
      Returns:
      a list of all schedules the user owns

      name - the name of the schedule to get

    • deleteSchedule
